name: Ice Scream
description:
I recommend the windows download as there is a weird audio bug that only occurs in WebGL. If you are having performance problems, download the windows version.

You can play the game with a mouse and keyboard, but an xbox controller is recommended. 

Running:
  • Left Stick - Movement
  • A - Pick up
  • Y - Get in Truck
  • Start - Pause Game
Driving:
  • Left Stick - Steer Left / Right
  • A - Accelerate
  • B - Brake / reverse
  • Y - Get out Truck
  • X - Make Icecream
  • Start - Pause Game

If you have a keyboard, you can use:

Running:
  • WASD / Arrows - Movement
  • Space / Enter / Z - Pick up
  • E / C- Get in Truck
  • Esc / P - Pause Game
Driving:
  • A D / Left - Right Arrow - Steer Left / Right
  • W / Up Arrow - Accelerate
  • S / Down Arrow- Brake / reverse
  • E / C  - Get out Truck
  • Space - Make Icecream
  • Esc / P - Pause Game

The game was developed over 8 days for the Episode 3 2022 Game Jam, which was organised by the Indie Game Squad. The theme of the jam was 'Agile and Afraid'.
